contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |state=IL |type=IL |maint=[[Illinois Department of Transportation|IDOT]] |route = 113 |length_mi = 33.95 |length_round = 2 |length_ref = <ref name=t2>{{cite web |author=Illinois Technology Transfer Center |url=http://gis.dot.illinois.gov/gist2 |title=T2 GIS Data |accessdate=2013-02-24 |date=2011}}</ref> |direction_a=West |terminus_a = {{Jct|state=IL|IL|47}} in [[Mazon, Illinois|Mazon]] |junction = {{Jct|state=IL|I|55}} in [[Braidwood, Illinois|Braidwood]] |direction_b=East |terminus_b = {{Jct|state=IL|IL|17}} in [[Kankakee, Illinois|Kankakee]] |counties = [[Grundy County, Illinois|Grundy]], [[Will County, Illinois|Will]], [[Kankakee County, Illinois|Kankakee]] |established = 1924<ref name=n9jig>Carlson, Rich. [http://www.n9jig.com/101-120.html Illinois Highways Page: Routes 101 thru 120]. Last updated March 15, 2005. Retrieved April 27, 2006.</ref> |previous_route = 111 |previous_type=IL |next_type=IL |next_route = 114 }} '''Illinois Route 113''' is a two-lane state road that runs east from [[Illinois Route 47]] north of [[Mazon, Illinois|Mazon]] and east of [[Seneca, Illinois|Seneca]] to [[Illinois Route 17]] in western [[Kankakee, Illinois|Kankakee]], just across the [[Kankakee River]] from [[U.S. Route 45]] and [[U.S. Route 52]]. This is a distance of {{convert|33.95|mi|km|2}}.<ref name="t2" /> == Route description == Route 113 begins at a junction with Route 47 in [[Grundy County, Illinois|Grundy County]] north of Mazon. From here, the route heads east through a rural area before passing through [[Coal City, Illinois|Coal City]] and [[Diamond, Illinois|Diamond]]. At the eastern edge of Diamond, Route 113 meets [[Interstate 55]]. Past this junction, the route turns southward, entering [[Braidwood, Illinois|Braidwood]] along Division Street. The highway turns east onto Main Street and intersects [[Illinois Route 129]] and [[Illinois Route 53]] at separate junctions. After leaving Braidwood to the east, Route 113 follows the southern bank of the Kankakee River; [[Illinois Route 102]] parallels this stretch of the route on the northern bank of the river. At [[Custer Park, Illinois|Custer Park]], the route crosses the Wauponsee Glacial Trail. Past Custer Park, the route runs past [[Kankakee River State Park]]. It then meets County Route 20, which crosses the river and connects Route 113 to Route 102.<ref>{{cite map |publisher=[[Illinois Department of Transportation]] |title=General Highway Map: Will County, Illinois |trans_title= |date= |year=2010 |url=http://www.dot.state.il.us/maps/county/will.pdf |scale= |series= |version= |cartography= |page= |pages= |section= |inset= |edition= |location= |language= |format=PDF |isbn= |id= |ref= |accessdate=March 1, 2013 |archiveurl= |archivedate= }}</ref> Past this junction, Route 113 enters [[Kankakee County, Illinois|Kankakee County]]. The road continues to follow the river into [[Kankakee, Illinois|Kankakee]], where it terminates at Route 17.<ref>{{google maps|title=Overview map of Illinois Route 113|url=https://maps.google.com/maps?saddr=IL-113+E&daddr=IL-113+E%2FW+Coal+City+Rd%2FJohnson+Rd+to:E+Main+St+to:E+Main+St+to:N+Wall+St&hl=en&ll=41.174519,-88.15979&spn=0.295116,0.676346&sll=41.122394,-87.880572&sspn=0.004583,0.010568&geocode=FfD0dQId9s-6-g%3BFa0EdgIdVbK9-g%3BFRGldQIdmf29-g%3BFaqidQId3gC--g%3BFRB2cwId_QvD-g&t=h&mra=mi&mrsp=4&sz=17&z=11|accessdate=March 1, 2013}}</ref> == History == SBI Route 113 was the name of both roads on the north and south sides of the Kankakee River from [[Diamond, Illinois|Diamond]] (between Coal City and Braidwood on [[Interstate 55]]) to Kankakee. In 1940, the route became ''[[Illinois Route 113N]]'' and ''[[Illinois Route 113S]]'', with 113N as the northern route and 113S as the southern, with 113S used as the western end to ''[[U.S. Route 66]]'' (now Interstate 55). In 1961, Illinois 113S became Illinois Route 113, and 113N was renamed Illinois Route 102.<ref name=n9jig/> ==Major intersections== {{jcttop|state=IL|length_ref=<ref name=t2/>}} {{ILint |county=Grundy |location=none |mile=0.00 |road={{jct|state=IL|IL|47}} |notes=Western terminus of IL 113}} {{ILint |county=Will |cspan=3 |location=Diamond |mile=9.85 |road={{jct|state=IL|I|55}} |notes=}} {{ILint |location=Braidwood |lspan=2 |mile=12.48 |road={{jct|state=IL|IL|129}} |notes=Southern terminus of IL 129}} {{ILint |mile=12.56 |road={{jct|state=IL|IL|53}} |notes=}} {{ILint |county=Kankakee |location=Kankakee |mile=33.95 |road={{jct|state=IL|IL|17}} |notes=Eastern terminus of IL 113}} {{jctbtm}} == References == {{reflist}} {{Attached KML|display=inline,title}} [[Category:State highways in Illinois|1|13]]
